column1: Bom Conselho ("Good Advice") is a city in northeastern Brazil
column2: in the state of Pernambuco. It lies in the mesoregion of Agreste of Pernambuco and has 786.2 sq/km of total area.

column1: Boundaries – Saloá and Terezinha (N); Alagoas state (S); Lagoa do Ouro (E); Iati (W).
The main economic activities in Bom Conselho are related to commerce and agribusiness
